mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Congressman Moore and his family in the back of a car
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Congressman Arch A. Moore, Jr. and his wife, Shelley, sitting on the back of a convertible car. Arch is wearing a lei and Shelley is holding a bouquet of flowers. Sitting in the back seat are their three children, Shelley, Arch (Kim), and Lucy. The side of the car says "Congressman Arch Moore."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Bouquets
